Method Detail

createAction

public static Action createAction(java.lang.String request)
                           throws IncorrectNumberOfArguments,
                                  CommandNonExistant,
                                  java.lang.Exception
Creates a new action of the appropriate type, or throws an error. Then attempts to use the rest of the request to pass the correct number of variable arguments to the constructor of our mapped action.

Returns:
